page.title: 06Gorran - Tourism
page.content: In Summer this quiet area of farms and villages totally changes with the invasion of holidaymakers.Many farms use some land as campsites or use converted outbuildings as holiday chalets.many of the cottages in Gorran Haven are also used as holiday homes. One small hotel,the Llawnroc (Cornwall reversed) takes in guests,and many homes provide overnight accomodation. In Gorran Haven there is a beach cafe, a take-away food shop,a gift shop,and an art studio - all open only in the summer months.Tourism has not really spoiled this area,there are no arcades or noisy enternments.People come to enjoy the Cornish climate,to swim in the clean water,to relax on the safe sandy beaches,to walk the coastal path,to go fishing or boating,to enjoy the beautiful scenery.
